definitions: A character that can be substituted for any of a class of characters in a search or other operation.
A person or thing whose unpredictable nature makes them a risk or an exciting prospect.
An entry in a competition or tournament who is not seeded but is admitted, usually because of their potential or popularity.
examples: Use an asterisk as a wildcard to search for all files.
She's a real wildcard, you never know what she'll do next.
The tennis player entered the tournament as a wildcard.
